pages.text: Everything in Create utilizes a different unit of power called $(3)su$(), which is short for $(3)stress units$(). Also, some general advice: higher RPM requires more $(3)stress$() to rotate, just like gear ratios IRL. That is why a Large Cogwheel connected to a Cogwheel rotates faster, but requires more $(3)su$() to function when connected to an appliance.

This is what is considered Tier 1 in terms of stress generation. Ensure that the water flow is flowing into the slats that will catch the flow most effectively. Utilize the Ponder tutorial to see this visually.$(br2)Notice: Create 0.5.1 will make Water Wheels bi-directional.
This is what is considered Tier 2 in terms of stress generation. It is recommended to craft a large amount of Sails and Sail Frames for functional use. Maximum output is 8,192 su.

This is what is considered Tier 3 in terms of stress generation. Ensure that your Mechanical Pump is rotating at a fast enough RPM and uses a separate source of stress as making a self-sufficient boiler will only cause additional complexity. I recommend using a Windmill Bearing as the source of stress for your Mechanical Pump.
